# hidora_create_env (Resource)





<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `environment` (Block List, Min: 1, Max: 1) (see [below for nested schema](#nestedblock--environment))
- `nodes` (Block List, Min: 1) The date and time of the creation of the Project (Format ISO 8601) (see [below for nested schema](#nestedblock--nodes))

### Optional

- `actionkey` (String)
- `appid` (String) Application Identity in Jelastic Platform
- `envgroups` (String) Define which group is chosen for the environment
- `owneruid` (Number) UID of the owner of environment

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) The ID of this resource.
